description: Rare opportunity to own a 3-level, family-sized townhome in one of Port Moody’s most desirable communities! Enjoy your private, fully fenced yard and sunny south-facing patio—ideal for kids, pets, and family BBQs. Recent upgrades include: new windows and balcony door, rebuilt front deck, updated kitchen counters and backsplash, renovated bathroom, newer appliances, furnace, refinished hardwood floors, and fresh paint throughout—just move in and enjoy! Located in a well-run, kid- and pet-friendly complex with $660K+ in the contingency reserve fund. Surrounded by greenbelt and trails, and within walking distance to great schools, parks, and the SkyTrain.
